moves.1. e4 e5: Not facing the Sicilian, a change!
moves.3... Bc5: Slightly un-usual take on the opening
moves.4. Bc4 d6 5. d4 exd4 6. cxd4 Bb4+ 7. Nc3: Not sure about this, seems a little negative
